{{Actor| | type = Gibs | name = Green chaos serpent bloody meat chunk | class = Demon1Chunk5 | game = Hexen }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:DemonChunk|DemonChunk]]→Demon1Chunk5
One of the five chunks of meat thrown around when a [[Classes:Demon1|green chaos serpent]] is gibbed. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR Demon1Chunk5 : [[Classes:DemonChunk|DemonChunk]] { States { Spawn: DEME A 4 DEME A 10 [[A_QueueCorpse]] DEME A 20 Wait Death: DEME A -1 Stop } }
